decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (3071-D(--)-2101-B Received 20/03/2015; Flood Risk Assessment (April 2015) Received 02/04/2015; 0943-01-100-C, Operational Management Plan Rev A (April 2015) Received 15/04/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The hereby approved use of the site shall be undertaken in accordance with the submitted Operational Management Plan Rev A (April 2015).

Condition : 4 - In accordance with the approved Operational Management Plan Rev A (April 2015), refuse and recycling waste from the residential moorings shall be stored on board vessels and collected weekly by the moorings management company for disposal at the existing refuse/recycling facilities within the Ferry Quays development.

Condition : 5 - No more than seven boats shall be permanently moored at the site for residential purposes. Each shall be moored in accordance with plan 0943-01-100-C. The boats moored at the site shall be restricted to a length of 38m, a single level of accommodation and with no superstructure exceeding two metres in height.
Condition : 6 - Each mooring shall be provided with a means of access to mains electricity when the development hereby approved is first implemented and permanently retained thereafter.
Condition : 7 - The occupants of the vessels using the moorings hereby approved shall not use generators and no maintenance shall be carried out on a boat while moored at the site.
description: Change of use of Leisure Moorings to seven residential moorings
